original_text: And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 그들의 우상을 그 곳에 버렸으므로 다윗이 명령하여 불에 사르니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had left their gods there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 신들을 그곳에 버려두었을 때

sentences.original_text: and they were burned with fire
